Alert Summary of Windows Security Updates for April 2004 Last Revised April 13, 2004 Alert Code SA04-104A Systems Affected Systems running Microsoft Windows Overview There are multiple vulnerabilities in Microsoft Windows that could allow attackers to take control of your computer. Description Microsoft has released Windows Security Updates for April 2004, which addresses multiple vulnerabilities in the Microsoft Windows operating system. Three of the four updates are considered critical, so users should apply the updates as soon as possible. A technical description of these vulnerabilities is available from US-CERT in TA04-104A and from Microsoft in MS04-011, MS04-012, MS04-013, and MS04-014. Resolution Apply a patch Follow the procedures outlined in Microsoft's Windows Security Updates for April 2004.
